Parameter.name: IOCard
Parameter.description: name of the IO_CARD used to manage the mouse's buttons

Parameter.name: powerButton
Parameter.description: Number of the Slave IOCard's relay used to power on or off the mouse

Parameter.name: pairButton
Parameter.description: Number of the Slave IOCard's relay used to put the mouse in pairable mode

Parameter.name: leftButton
Parameter.description: Number of the Slave IOCard's relay used to press left button

Parameter.name: rightButton
Parameter.description: Number of the Slave IOCard's relay used to press the right button

Parameter.name: middleButton
Parameter.description: Number of the Slave IOCard's relay used to press the middle button

Parameter.name: keyPressTimer
Parameter.description: Timer for click (press - release), in second

Parameter.name: pairTimer
Parameter.description: Period to hold the pairing button for
